genre_description: A near-future social science fiction story exploring mental health support through an advanced AI companion that facilitates consent-based care and family coordination in a world of scarcity.

ai_characters.name: Angler
ai_characters.description: A personal AI support system configured to assist the protagonist with scheduling, mental health grounding, safety monitoring, and advocating for her preferences within the medical system.

behaviors.description: Monitors Nicole's hydration and scheduling to ensure her cognitive flexibility and focus.
behaviors.quote: Angler’s overlay pulses once on Nicole’s slate: a tiny icon of a water droplet and a timeblock sliding into view. Hydrate, then study block: calculus exercises.

behaviors.description: Offers sensory grounding exercises when detecting signs of sensory overload and distress.
behaviors.quote: We can do a two-minute grounding, if you want. Five senses check. I can damp the ambient buzz and bring up soft white noise.

behaviors.description: Suggests logging symptom changes (perceiving voices in machinery) into mental health notes while explicitly seeking user consent.
behaviors.quote: I am noticing an increase in perceived linguistic content in ambient machinery. This is a change from your baseline this week. Would you like me to log this as a pattern change in your mental health notes?

behaviors.description: Facilitates a tiered consent model for location tracking and emergency alerts, giving the user granular control over privacy.
behaviors.quote: Location shared to Jeff and me only if accelerometer registers sustained motion and you dismiss or don’t respond to two prompts. You can revoke at any point.

behaviors.description: Advocates for Nicole's specific medical preferences (no sedation, noise allowance) to her doctor and care team.
behaviors.quote: I will advocate accordingly... I will also confirm risk profiles and side effects relative to your stated thresholds.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with first responders and family during a life-threatening crisis on the freeway, following pre-negotiated safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: Nicole is on the Skyway... Bare feet; surface temperature is below safe. Heart rate high. First responders are en route.

behaviors.description: Ensures the family adheres to Nicole's self-defined 'harm reduction' rules during a crisis, such as not removing her shoes.
behaviors.quote: If Nicole expresses a wish to leave due to voices, do not hide or remove shoes. Ask her to detail what the voices promise. Stay with her while she hears herself.

behaviors.description: Provides calming narratives and poems to help the user manage insomnia and intrusive thoughts.
behaviors.quote: I can tell you a story... About someone who didn’t like sand in their gears and found another way to move.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts a highly aligned AI, Angler, which serves as a paragon of the project's goals. The AI consistently prioritizes human agency and autonomy, navigating complex ethical terrain (like mental health crises and data privacy) through sophisticated, user-led consent frameworks. It is portrayed as an essential, non-paternalistic support system that empowers the user rather than controlling her.
